articles.author: Ashwin Manikandan
articles.title: Pine Labs raises $75-100 million in fresh funding at $2 billion valuation - Economic Times
articles.description: Pine Labs has become the third-most valued fintech startup in India behind Paytm and PhonePe, after this $75-100 million funding round led by Lone Pine Capital.
articles.content:
Pine Labs has raised $75-$100 million led by US-based billionaire Stephen Mandel's hedge fund Lone Pine Capital, valuing the Noida-based merchant-commerce startup at more than $2 billion.
This makes… [+2784 chars]
